snippet: David Beck, vice president for strategic initiatives in the office of the chief executive at Univision Communications, New York, was promoted to a new post, senior vice president for social media.
lead_paragraph: David Beck, vice president for strategic initiatives in the office of the chief executive at Univision Communications, New York, was promoted to a new post, senior vice president for social media.
